evan2.description:
Evan spent the night on Saturday. He and Felix were obviously VERY happy to see eachother.

What's so funny?
evan2.title: Evan 2

evan3.description:
Papa, of course.

Evan calls Dean "Papa" as well, since that's what Felix calls him, and his own dad goes by "daddy". However, he does not call Lucie "Mommy", since he has a "mommy" of his own.
evan3.title: Evan 3

evan4.description:
They spent a lot of time reading books side by side, and commenting on the best passages.

"- Look, Felix, a choo-choo train
- Yeah. Look, Evan, digger
- That's no a digger, Felix, that's a tow truck
- tow truck?"

Evan speaks in perfectly grammatical sentences now and, as always, his vehicle terminology is much more precise than Felix's.
evan4.title: Evan 4

profile.description: Lucie's belly is getting so big now, that it sticks out of most her so-called pregnancy clothes... and there is still a month or two to go!
profile.title: Profile

wyatt1.description: Wyatt (age 1 1/2) and his parents came over for brunch. Whenever Wyatt would touch something he was not supposed to (the TV, the fireplace...), Felix tried to give him a time-out.
wyatt1.title: Wyatt 1

wyatt2.description: Felix gives a tour of his room to Wyatt and his dad Chris.
wyatt2.title: Wyatt 2

ymca.description:
The action just doesn't stop long enough to take a photo, at our local YMCA. Felix and Lucie joined last week, and they have already been several times.

Together, they go to the Kid's Gym (with its giant bin of balls, pictured here) or to the shallow swimming pool. Alone, Lucie goes swim laps. She also tried out a "prenatal/postpartum trans-dance aerobic class"... only in Berkeley!
ymca.title: Ymca

description: We had a social week. Now that we are feeling a little more settled, we are having friends over to check out our new home, and to drop off borrowed baby gear for Bastille.
title: June 9
